column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Jinya has some of the best ramen in Houston! I usually go at off times
column2: so there is never really any wait. The staff are great
column3: the cocktails are okay. The parking is meh
column5: I'll put up with it. Their cha cha cha dish is my favorite
column6: and I recommend making your ramen into a combo!
